summary: This mod allow all master trainers to be able to train you up to 100 in the skill instead of capping it at 90.
descriptionHtml:
This mod allow all master trainers to be able to train you up to 100 in the skill instead of capping it at 90. This mod also works great with my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45424/?]Skyrim Unlimited Training[/url] which allows you to train as much was you want without waiting to level up. If you are using the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url] you will only need to download the True Master Trainers (Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch) file. If you are not using the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url] you will need to download the True Master Trainers file. If you are not using the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url] and you have the Dawnguard DLC you will need to download the True Master Trainers (Dawnguard) file. If you are not using the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url] and you have the Dragonborn DLC you will need to download the True Master Trainers (Dragonborn) file. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/772?]here[/url].


Requirements
Skyrim
Dawnguard (True Master Trainers (Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch), True Master Trainers (Dawnguard)
Hearthfire (True Master Trainers (Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch))
Dragonborn (True Master Trainers (Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch), True Master Trainers (Dragonborn)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url] (True Master Trainers (Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch))


To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
